Report.comment: O.MEMBER_ID ={User ID} AND O.STOREENT_ID = (Store id} AND
Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDERS_ID AS "Order_id", CTDC.NAME AS "Item", OI.QUANTITY AS "Quantity", OI.FULFILLMENTSTATUS AS "Item Status", OI.PRICE AS "Item Price", OI.INVENTORYSTATUS AS "Inventory", O.TIMEPLACED AS "Order placed", O.LASTUPDATE AS "Last Update", O.STATUS AS "Order Status", (O.TOTALADJUSTMENT+O.TOTALPRODUCT+O.TOTALTAX+O.TOTALTAXSHIPPING+O.TOTALSHIPPING) AS "AMOUNT", O.CURRENCY FROM ORDERITEMS OI, CATENTDESC CTDC, ORDERS O WHERE O.ORDERS_ID=OI.ORDERS_ID AND OI.CATENTRY_ID=CTDC.CATENTRY_ID AND O.MEMBER_ID= {user_id} AND O.STOREENT_ID = {storeent_id} AND CTDC.LANGUAGE_ID = {LanguageID} AND O.TIMEPLACED >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ AND O.TIMEPLACED <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ ORDER BY O.TIMEPLACED DESC

userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size : 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : Black; }

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDERS_ID AS "Order_id", CTDC.NAME AS "Item", OI.QUANTITY AS "Quantity", OI.FULFILLMENTSTATUS AS "Item Status", OI.PRICE AS "Item Price", OI.INVENTORYSTATUS AS "Inventory", O.TIMEPLACED AS "Order placed", O.LASTUPDATE AS "Last Update", O.STATUS AS "Order Status", (O.TOTALADJUSTMENT+O.TOTALPRODUCT+O.TOTALTAX+O.TOTALTAXSHIPPING+O.TOTALSHIPPING) AS "AMOUNT", O.CURRENCY FROM ORDERITEMS OI, CATENTDESC CTDC, ORDERS O WHERE O.ORDERS_ID=OI.ORDERS_ID AND OI.CATENTRY_ID=CTDC.CATENTRY_ID AND O.MEMBER_ID= {user_id} AND O.STOREENT_ID = {storeent_id} AND CTDC.LANGUAGE_ID = {LanguageID} AND YEAR(O.TIMEPLACED) = YEAR(CURRENT DATE ) AND WEEK(O.TIMEPLACED) = WEEK(CURRENT DATE ) ORDER BY O.LASTUPDATE ASC

userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size : 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : Black; }

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDERS_ID AS "Order_id", CTDC.NAME AS "Item", OI.QUANTITY AS "Quantity", OI.FULFILLMENTSTATUS AS "Item Status", OI.PRICE AS "Item Price", OI.INVENTORYSTATUS AS "Inventory", O.TIMEPLACED AS "Order placed", O.LASTUPDATE AS "Last Update", O.STATUS AS "Order Status", (O.TOTALADJUSTMENT+O.TOTALPRODUCT+O.TOTALTAX+O.TOTALTAXSHIPPING+O.TOTALSHIPPING) AS "AMOUNT", O.CURRENCY FROM ORDERITEMS OI, CATENTDESC CTDC, ORDERS O WHERE O.ORDERS_ID=OI.ORDERS_ID AND OI.CATENTRY_ID=CTDC.CATENTRY_ID AND O.MEMBER_ID= {user_id} AND O.STOREENT_ID = {storeent_id} AND CTDC.LANGUAGE_ID = {LanguageID} AND YEAR(O.TIMEPLACED) = YEAR(CURRENT DATE ) AND MONTH(O.TIMEPLACED) = MONTH(CURRENT DATE ) ORDER BY O.LASTUPDATE ASC

userDefinedParameters.THStyle: TH { font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size: 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : white; font-weight : bold; }
userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size : 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : Black; }

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDERS_ID AS "Order_id", CTDC.NAME AS "Item", OI.QUANTITY AS "Quantity", OI.FULFILLMENTSTATUS AS "Item Status", OI.PRICE AS "Item Price", OI.INVENTORYSTATUS AS "Inventory", O.TIMEPLACED AS "Order placed", O.LASTUPDATE AS "Last Update", O.STATUS AS "Order Status", (O.TOTALADJUSTMENT+O.TOTALPRODUCT+O.TOTALTAX+O.TOTALTAXSHIPPING+O.TOTALSHIPPING) AS "AMOUNT", O.CURRENCY FROM ORDERITEMS OI, CATENTDESC CTDC, ORDERS O WHERE O.ORDERS_ID=OI.ORDERS_ID AND OI.CATENTRY_ID=CTDC.CATENTRY_ID AND O.MEMBER_ID= {user_id} AND O.STOREENT_ID = {storeent_id} AND CTDC.LANGUAGE_ID = {LanguageID} AND YEAR(O.TIMEPLACED) = YEAR(CURRENT DATE ) AND QUARTER(O.TIMEPLACED) = QUARTER(CURRENT DATE ) ORDER BY O.LASTUPDATE ASC
